title: Inferno
overview: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
overview: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

title: Sing 2
overview: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
overview: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate M. Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.
